程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage

接口 WriteBuffer

所有已知子接口:
DataOutput
所有已知实现类:
WriteByteBuffer
public interface WriteBuffer
A Buffer that allows simple writes and returns the result as a StaticBuffer.
作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
